remarks: Comparison of the limits of two sequences.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)
statement:
rlimle.1 $e |- ( ph -> sup ( A , RR* , < ) = +oo ) $.
rlimle.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) ~~>r D ) $.
rlimle.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) ~~>r E ) $.
rlimle.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
rlimle.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. RR ) $.
rlimle.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B <_ C ) $.
rlimle $p |- ( ph -> D <_ E ) $.
$d A x $.
$d D x $.
$d E x $.
$d ph x $.
